text: On Sunday morning, WWE ’ s official website touted the success of the Bella Twins ’ YouTube Channel as it hit a big milestone. The channel hit two million subscribers. The Bellas were last seen on WWE programming when Nikki lost to Ronda Rousey with the Raw Women ’ s Title being on the line at the first - ever women ’ s PPV event, Evolution. WWE issued the following : The Bellalution continues! The Bella Twins YouTube Channel has reached two million subscribers! The channel that gives The Bella Army an intimate look at the lives of Nikki & Brie has reached the incredible milestone of two million subscribers. WWE. com congratulates Nikki, Brie, and the entire Bella Army on this amazing accomplishment! The post WWE Touts Success Of Bella Twins ’ YouTube Channel appeared first on eWrestling
